description:
Lulu Bell is the Twelfth Disciple of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah Family], representing the Lust of Noah and is truly named Lustul.
When she is in her Noah form, her hair is black, as is typical of the Noah. Lulu Bell possesses the ability of "Form", allowing her to change her body into anything she wishes, including liquids, animals, or the appearance of others. She often appears as a cat with a pale stigmata on its forehead.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Lulu Bell
